title: METRO MEMORIAL PARK
description: The memorial is intended to honor the remembrance of the nine victims, first respondents, and others whose lives were altered by the 2009 D.C. Metrorail Red Line train collision. The selected artist, landscape architect, or design team will work in collaboration with the District Department of General Services (DGS) to install all artistic elements of the permanent memorial park.
justification: The memorial park should allow for meditation, remembrance, reflection, hope, and renewal. Accommodations are inclusive of an entrance marker, public artwork, seating, play area, pedestrian walkway, landscaping, and solar lighting, along with other environmentally sustainable features.
